original_title: Five takeaways from a week of Trump’s Ukraine diplomacy — RT World News
article_summary: Slovak Prime Minister Robert Fico claims the Putin-Trump summit in Alaska has challenged Western narratives on Russia, erasing a single mandatory opinion on the Ukraine conflict. Fico urges the EU to adopt a more dialogue-focused approach with Moscow, while Trump calls for flexibility from Ukraine's Zelensky to end the conflict with Russia.</s>
